column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: The bridge crossing the Tonle Sap River on National Road 5 in Russey Keo
column4: to Chroy Changvar will be opened as normal from September 16
column6: after a period of delay due to an ------oil tanker cashing into it.------According to the Phnom Penh Municipal Administration
column7: the bridge will be re-opened from 7 am September 16
column8: following efforts of engineers and workers to repair the structure.------It is hoped this crossing will ease traffic congestion during the Pchum Ben holiday period. ------KBN
